DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess impact Multi Point Pacing ( MPP ) feature treatment patient QRS beetwen 100 130 msec patient candidate ICD implant .
DOC.brief_title: MPP Narrow QRS : Pilot Study Multipoint Pacing Patients With QRS Beetwen 100 130 Msec
DOC.criteria: Patients EF < 35 % OPT least 3 month candidate ICD QRS duration : 100130 m Patients willing able comply study requirement Must indicate understand study willingness participate sign appropriate informed consent form Successful quadripolar LV lead implant ( Treatment Group ) Myocardial Infarction , unstable angina within 40 day prior enrollment Patients leave ventricular contractile reserve low dose dobutamine stress echocardiography test Recent cardiac revascularization ( PTCA , Stent CABG ) 4 week prior enrollment plan 3 month follow Cerebrovascular Accident ( CVA ) Transient Ischemic Attack ( TIA ) 3 month prior enrollment Primary valvular disease Unable comply follow schedule Less 18 year age Pregnant planning become pregnant duration investigation Classification Status 1 cardiac transplantation consideration transplantation next 12 month Undergone cardiac transplantation Life expectancy < 12 month Patients permanent Atrial fibrillation Patients Nyha 1
